title: How I Tripled My Amazon KDP Sales in 30 Days - Keyword Research for Beginners
description:
Most beginners publish their book and hope for the best — and that’s why it never sells. In this video, I’ll show you how proper keyword research changed everything for my KDP sales and how you can apply the same system step by step.

Timestamps:
00:03 - Beginners mistakes
00:56 - What happens when you publish a book (without keyword research)
01:57 - The foundation 
02:01 - How KDP’s keyword system works
02:40 - Tropes make up most of your keywords
03:56 - Keyword research process
06:49 - Categories
10:08 - Putting it all together in KDP
11:53 - Build a real publishing business
12:12 - Check out Fiction Profits Academy
